data.text: @juanjohnjedi @AwesomeCon Right? Unless I missed something, Fairfax County just across the Potomac is still a "high transmission area."
@Thanatos_1369 You gonna get covid. Sure the disease maybe currently on the decline but how fast you think it'll come back if everyone is back to coughing on each other.

@AwesomeCon Hey…..recent trends are great but maybe let’s not assume that things will be hunky dory by June? No reason you had to make this announcement now and not leave yourselves any wiggle room if another variant/wave hits.
@AwesomeCon no thanks I prefer to wear my mask. This is unexpectable https://t.co/Jqdn3EWEcI
@AwesomeCon been to every year in various capacities. this is disheartening.
@AwesomeCon Awesome news indeed!!! Cant wait to attend this year and have a truly awesome con ❤
@Thanatos_1369 @AwesomeCon Oh wait your an nft bro. Lol not even gonna have a conversation with you bye
